figures.title: LLM vs Brain Emulation Pipelines
figures.description: Side-by-side comparison of Large Language Model training pipelines (data science, machine learning) versus Brain Emulation Model pipelines (neural dynamics, connectomics, computational neuroscience).

figures.title: Mouse to Digital Twin
figures.description: Conceptual illustration of transforming a biological mouse into its digital emulation, showing the transition from organic to computational representation.

figures.title: Structure to Function Pipeline
figures.description: The brain emulation pipeline from neural dynamics and connectomics through to computational neuroscience, showing how structural data (connectome) combines with functional data to enable simulation, embodiment, and behavior.

_instructions.note: Add your hand-drawn figures to this folder as PNG and SVG pairs (e.g., figure-name.png and figure-name.svg)

fields.id: Unique identifier for the figure (use lowercase with hyphens)
fields.title: Display title for the figure
fields.description: Brief description of what the figure shows
fields.filename: Base filename without extension (e.g., 'neuron-diagram' for neuron-diagram.png/svg)
fields.organism: Array of organism tags: all, c-elegans, drosophila, zebrafish, mouse, rat, human, mammalian, silicon
fields.type: Array of type tags: hand-drawn, plus any relevant: overview, simulation, recording, anatomy, etc.
